label: Administrative Support Services
quote: ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT PERSONNEL SERVICES

label: Adherence to Deliverables Schedule
quote: DELIVERABLES AND DELIVERY SCHEDULE

label: Security Compliance
quote: SECURITY

label: Special Considerations
quote: SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS

label: Federal Retirement Counseling
quote: The purpose of this statement of work (SOW) is to acquire expert Federal retirement and benefit counseling services along with benefit processing services to support the National Programs Division (NPD), Retirement and Benefits Advisory Services (RABAS) Branch, located in Washington DC.

label: Benefit Processing Services
quote: The purpose of this statement of work (SOW) is to acquire expert Federal retirement and benefit counseling services along with benefit processing services to support the National Programs Division (NPD), Retirement and Benefits Advisory Services (RABAS) Branch, located in Washington DC.

label: Insurance and Retirement Application Processing
quote: Reviewing, completing and processing health and life insurance requests and retirement applications submitted by employees.

label: Assignment Accuracy and Timeliness
quote: The contractor shall be responsible for ensuring the accuracy, timeliness and completeness of assignments and tasks.

label: Office Automation Software Use
quote: 3.1.1 Ability to use office automation software with varied functions to produce a wide range of documents, forms, reports etc. Transmit and receive documents and messages electronically using government furnished computers or workstations.

label: Data Manipulation and Reporting
quote: 3.1.2 Ability to obtain and manipulate data and generate reports from automated systems.

label: Records Maintenance
quote: 3.1.3 Ability to maintain records in accordance with CBP guidelines.

label: Communication Preparation
quote: 3.1.4 Ability to prepare multiple forms of communication for distribution an internal and external to CBP.

label: Special Retirement Coverage Knowledge
quote: 3.1.5 Knowledge of special retirement coverage, i.e. Law Enforcement Officer (LEO), Customs and Border Protection Officer CBPO).

label: Office Equipment Experience
quote: 3.2.1 Must have experience using office equipment, including computers, scanners, and copiers.

label: Software Experience (Adobe/MS Office)
quote: 3.2.2 Must have experience using Adobe Acrobat Pro and Microsoft Office (Word/Excel/PowerPoint/Outlook).

label: High-Volume Workflow Experience
quote: 3.2.3 Must have experience maintaining a consistent high-volume workflow while maintain accurate task completion.

label: Agency-Specific Systems Experience
quote: 3.2.4 Must have experience learning new/agency specific computer systems (i.e., Salesforce, FedHR navigator, etc.)

label: Effective Communication Experience
quote: 3.2.5 Must have experience as an effective communicator (oral and written).

label: Experience with Diverse Groups
quote: 3.2.6 Must have experience working with individuals and diverse groups.

label: Background Investigation Eligibility
quote: 3.2.7 Must be able to pass pre-employment and periodic background investigations.

label: Resume Submission per Labor Category
quote: The contractor will provide the resume for each labor category in accordance with the HCATS labor category defined below:

label: Project Manager Experience and Degree
quote: The Senior HCATS labor category has over 10 years of experience and a Master of Arts(MA)/Master of Science (MS) degree.

label: Project Manager Federal Benefits Knowledge
quote: The Project Manager will possess a comprehensive range of knowledge and experience in Federal retirement and benefits along with the function areas assigned.

label: Project Manager Task Completion
quote: Ensures successful task completion within the scheduled timeframe consistent with the established scope of work to include technical solutions.

label: Project Manager Project Planning and Reporting
quote: Develops project plans and milestones, status reports and other deliverables, and monitors the execution of the task for quality and against planned timelines.
